metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5938 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the nav_path function inlib/viewvc.py in ViewVC before 1.0.14 and 1.1.x before 1.1.26 allows remoteattackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the nav_data name.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5938` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

viewvc - 1.1.22-1+deb8u1build0.16.04.1
viewvc-query - 1.1.22-1+deb8u1build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: viewvc package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.1.22-1+deb8u1build0.16.04.1').
